mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (content, pointTotal, pointLike, pointDislike, pointComment, pointShare, providerUserId, name, ipAddress, regDate) VALUES (#{content}, #{pointTotal}, #{pointLike}, #{pointDislike}, #{pointComment}, #{pointShare}, #{providerUserId}, #{name}, #{ipAddress}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET content = #{content}, pointTotal = #{pointTotal}, pointLike = #{pointLike}, pointDislike = #{pointDislike}, pointComment = #{pointComment}, pointShare = #{pointShare}, providerUserId = #{providerUserId}, name = #{name}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress} where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointComment = pointComment + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointComment = pointComment - 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointLike = pointLike + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointLike = pointLike - 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointDislike = pointDislike + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointDislike = pointDislike - 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointShare = pointShare + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET pointShare = pointShare - 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
